    • register

      public java.lang.String register​(java.lang.String userName, java.lang.String passWord, int age)
      Method for adding new users into the application
      Parameters:
      userName - New User's username
      passWord - New User's password
      age - New User's Age
      Returns:
      Message stating if user was successfully registered

    • addSongToPool

      public java.lang.String addSongToPool​(java.lang.String title, java.lang.String artist, java.lang.String releaseDate, java.lang.String duration, int genre, java.lang.String username)
      Method that adds a new song to the song pool
      Parameters:
      title - title of the song
      artist - artist or band of the song
      releaseDate - date song was released
      duration - duration of the song in format mm/ss
      genre - genre of the song [1-6]
      Returns:
      Message stating if the song was added or not to the song pool

      playlistTitle - title of an existing playlist
